--- | --- | --- | --- | ---
 | Number | WASP | Number | WASP
Restricted share units | 000’s | £ pence | 000’s | £ pence
Outstanding at the start of the year | 14,840 | 316.09 | 15,350 | 215.92
Awarded | 8,749 | 478.44 | 6,337 | 453.14
Forfeited | (1,421) | 426.11 | (1,421) | 284.15
Released | (6,822) | 309.77 | (5,426) | 218.49
Outstanding at the end of the year | 15,346 | 401.27 | 14,840 | 316.09

paragraph 1: Restricted Share Units
paragraph 2: The following table illustrates the number and WASP on date of award, and movements in, restricted share units (“RSUs”) and cash-based awards granted under the 2015 LTIP:
paragraph 3: RSUs and cash-based awards have a vesting period between two to five years, with no award vesting within the first 12 months of the grant.
